post.title: 8 Best Hyvä Theme Examples From Real Sites In 2024
post.content:
The Hyvä theme has become the store owner’s go-to theme, as it comes with affordable and superior functionalities.

But, if you are still unsure about using this theme.

In this blog, find the best Hyvä theme examples on real sites that showcase its impressive performance and demonstrate how it can elevate your Magento store.

What is Hyvä Theme In Magento 2?

The Hyvä theme is the reason Magento stores have seen improvements in customer experience and resolved issues with slow-loading pages.

Before the launch of the Hyvä theme in 2021, the Luma theme was popular. However, due to its limited features, it was time-consuming.

The Hyvä theme quickly gained popularity because of its excellent features and support systems, making development and implementation much easier for Magento stores to overcome front-end problems.

Here are some additional benefits the Hyvä theme comes with:

  • The Hyvä theme helps Magento stores to build from scratch using the PHP-templating system.
  • The theme is loved for its performance and a 100/100-page speed score.
  • It saves you around 30 to 50% in build time compared to the default Luma Theme or PWA solutions.
  • The theme is easy to modify and is favored by developers for its overall ease of use.

Experience the fastest frontend with our free Hyvä demo store.

8 Best Hyvä Theme Examples On Magento 2 Store

As we discussed the Hyvä theme for Magento 2 stores and its impressive benefits, let’s now explore some of the best e-commerce websites built on the Hyvä theme.

These examples will demonstrate its exceptional performance and ability to elevate your e-commerce site.

Here are the best Hyvä theme cases we’ve found:

1. Bizaar.ai

Bizaar.ai is a leading B2B IT hardware distributor that serves both B2C and B2B customers with offerings like bulk pricing, custom quotes, special order processing, and a seamless user experience tailored to different product catalogs and processes.

However, Bizaar faced many challenges with order placements, integrating quick ordering, and credit limit options. This led them to adopt the Hyvä theme, which helped achieve great results:

  • Increased conversion rate by more than 2.1%, higher than most B2B companies
  • Increased session duration by 422%
  • Improved overall page time to an average of 8.28 pages, thanks to reduced loading speeds

2. JC-Electronics

JC-Electronics, based in Leek, Netherlands, is a multimillion-dollar company specializing in repairing, refurbishing, selling, and purchasing industrial electronics.

However, JC-Electronics faced challenges with managing B2B features, order processing, and quick delivery demands. Previously using the Luma theme, they decided to shift to the Hyvä theme, and here are the results:

  • Product Detail Pages are 4.5x faster (from 5.2 seconds to 1.15 seconds).
  • Full page load times for checkout are 5.7x faster (from 16.25 seconds to 2.83 seconds).
  • The new system supports rapid feature implementation and reduces complexity, boosting overall productivity.

3. Dunkin

Dunkin’ has been a beloved American brand with over 11,000 stores across the U.S. Founded by William Rosenberg, the brand became famous for its combination of donuts and coffee—a pairing that keeps customers coming back.

Before implementing the Hyvä theme, Dunkin’s UK website was a simple catalog for in-store and delivery service products. The challenge was to build a full eCommerce site from scratch within a tight timeframe. Dunkin’ developed an e-shop with Hyvä, incorporating Magento, branding elements, and essential functionalities like shipping and payment integration.

Here are the results:

  • 100% increase in conversion rate, as online purchasing was not available previously.
  • Organic traffic increased by 6.1%.
  • Click-through rate (CTR) up by 36%.
  • Returning users increased by 30%.

4. Barr Display

Barr Display offers a wide range of products, including large items like store counters and shelving solutions, which require complex delivery processes. They use ShipperHQ to manage shipping options and costs based on item size, weight, and destination.

The technical team then replicated the ShipperHQ’s Luma theme functionality within the Hyvä Checkout in just three days, thanks to excellent support and documentation from the Hyvä team. This integration led to impressive results:

  • Revenue increased by 16.57%.
  • Average Order Value rose by 20.57%.
  • Page Load Time improved by 20.39%.
  • Sessions with Checkout went up by 32.09%

5. Citizen Watch

Citizen Watch is a Japanese company founded in 1930 by Japanese and Swiss investors that produces watches and other electronic products.

As Citizen Watch UK aimed to expand, they faced challenges in attracting new customers due to issues with website speed, usability, and mobile experience. Seeking a solution, they discovered the Hyvä theme and implemented it, achieving impressive results:

  • Traffic increased by 65% with new users.
  • Conversion rates up by 43%.
  • Revenue increased by 141%.
  • Transaction volume up by 161%.

6. HNK Hajduk Split

HNK Hajduk Split is one of Croatia’s most recognizable football clubs, with over a hundred thousand registered fans.

As Hajduk has faced instability and crashes with their previous system, especially during high-traffic periods. They required a stable, high-performance, and user-friendly solution that would also foster a sense of community among fans. The Hyvä theme was implemented and resulted in impressive improvements:

  • Revenue increased by over 99% YoY (2024 vs. 2023)
  • Desktop page speed improved by 58.45% (Time to First Byte: 0.662s to 0.275s)
  • Mobile page speed increased by 40% (Time to First Byte: 0.755s to 0.450s)
  • Homepage page weight decreased by 65% (8.46Mb to 2.96Mb)

7. Case24

Case24 is a leading player in the custom phone case industry, offering customers the unique ability to design personalized cases by uploading their own photos or graphics.

However, Case24 faced a significant challenge that their website’s poor performance was impacting customer satisfaction and market competitiveness. The slow load times and subpar user experience were detrimental to their business.

Recognizing these issues and a need for a faster, more efficient online platform, Case24 turned to Hyvä development services. The results were remarkable. Post-implementation, the website’s performance improved drastically, with its GTMetrix grade soaring from a D to an impressive A.

Here are the standout PageSpeed metrics for Case24’s newly optimized website:

  • Overall performance score increased to 95%
  • User engagement improved by 30%

8. 21Run

21 Run is a premier online retailer dedicated to running enthusiasts. Specializing in a wide range of running gear, 21 Run offers everything from high-performance running shoes to stylish apparel, essential accessories, and nutrition supplements.

Serving both casual runners and seasoned athletes, the store features products from top brands, ensuring customers have access to the best in running technology and comfort.

To enhance their eCommerce experience, 21 Run implemented the Hyvä theme, which significantly improved their website’s performance across both mobile and desktop platforms. This upgrade brought about impressive metrics:

  • The website now loads its largest visible content in just 1 second, ensuring users see key content quickly.
  • The server response time is optimized to 0.3 seconds, contributing to faster overall page load times.

Implement Hyvä Theme On Your Magento 2 Store

We discussed how the Hyvä theme can help your e-commerce store boost its performance and customer experience. Here is an overview to easily implement or install the Hyvä theme on Magento 2 store.

  • Firstly, you need to get access to Hyvä GitLab to obtain all their repositories.
  • Then, set the license key to ensure you have a valid license.
  • Now, install the theme, activate it and check in the front end.
